item.title: Apache mod_wsgi parallelization notes
item.description: This is my notes on ‘Processes and Threading’ doc by the author of mod_wsgi module of Apache. This blog post just serves as a ‘quick refresher’, and is only useful if you have read the original document but it's been too long since you read it :) Apache with mod_wsgi A Python application can run with multiple processes as well as multiple threads with mod_wsgi. Prefork multiprocessing module Apache creates multiple processes, and each request is handled by one process.
